name: SuperGPT
description: A description for Super GPT plugin
integration.instructions: 1. Goto Settings -> Users & Permissions plugin -> Roles and enable   strapi-supergpt endpoint for a role.
integration.openAiParams: Sample request with additional OpenAi params
helpModal.promptUse: You may use prompts such as the followings to get meaningful response from chatGPT:
helpModal.promptList:
1. Create a quiz with 5 multiple choice questions that assess students' understanding of [concept being taught]
  2. Find the bug with this code: [post code below]
  3. What exactly does this regex do? rege(x(es)?|xps?)
  4. Describe [topic of your choice] in detail
  5. Please provide a definition for the medical term 'tachycardia'
  6. Generate a summary of [specified document]
  7. Translate the following text into [specified language]
  8. Provide coding examples in [specified programming language]
  9. Explain the significance of [historical event]
  10. Assist in brainstorming ideas for [project or topic]
  11. Generate an image based on the description you provide
settingsPage.description: Configure the API key, model name, and other parameters
settingsPage.notifications.saving-error: Error while saving the chatGPT configurations
customFields.super-single-select.label: Super Single Select
customFields.super-single-select.descrip: A single select field powered by chatgpt
customFields.super-multi-select.label: Super Multi Select
customFields.super-multi-select.descript: A multi select field powered by chatgpt
customFields.super-textarea.label: Super Textarea
customFields.super-image.label: Super Image
